name: The Broken Rover
description:
The itch.io play screen restricts this game's ability to scroll and present all content. Please play the game through the links below:

Version 1.0 (Indie Galactic Space Jam Version)

Version 1.1 (8/18/2015)

The Broken Rover is an alternate reality game in a box. It's set on an asteroid, and it's full of fun secrets. Search keywords to find important evidence, learn what happened, and submit your findings to see how this mystery ends.

Designed and developed by Mike Pynn

Written by Irene Pynn

Directed by Rob Cunha
